name: Bug Bang
description: In this game you are a sheriff of the wild west and your task is to eliminate all the outlaw insects that roam the city. You must use the mouse to aim and the left mouse button to shoot all the barrels and find the mosquito you are looking for. But be careful! Your weapon has a limited number of bullets... The game is over when you execute the miscreant or your weapon runs out of bullets. Be careful!
